Monologue.Current: Студент{Line}“Привет, {Char Squall}.{Line} Как поживаешь?”
Monologue.Original: Garden Student{Line}“Hey, {Char Squall}.{Line} How’s it going?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Что ты здесь делаешь?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“What are you{Line} doing here?”

Monologue.Current: Garden Student{Line}“Ditching. Getting a little R & R. I’m{Line} tired, y’know. I need a vacation.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Student{Line}“Ditching. Getting a little R & R. I’m{Line} tired, y’know. I need a vacation.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“My goodness. You sound like an old man.{Line} ...I guess I’ll let you off this time.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“My goodness. You sound like an old man.{Line} ...I guess I’ll let you off this time.”

Monologue.Current: “Next time, I’m going to report you for sure.”
Monologue.Original: “Next time, I’m going to report you for sure.”

Monologue.Current: Студент{Line}“Добрый день, инструктор,{Line} не хотите присесть? Скучно одному.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Student{Line}“Hey Instructor, won’t you have a seat?{Line} I could really use the company.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Хорошо... Ну, а чтобы не терять{Line} время, давай разберём тест,{Line} который ты вчера завалил.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Alright... While we’re at it, we can go{Line} over the test you flunked the other day.”

Monologue.Current: Студент{Line}“Хмм... какое же у меня{Line} следующее занятие?”
Monologue.Original: Garden Student{Line}“Hmmm...what’s my{Line} next class?”

Monologue.Current: “Man!{Line} Pisses me off!”
Monologue.Original: “Man!{Line} Pisses me off!”

Monologue.Current: “Knowin’ a guy 5 or 10 years{Line} doesn’t mean a thing.{Line} I still can’t figure him out.”
Monologue.Original: “Knowin’ a guy 5 or 10 years{Line} doesn’t mean a thing.{Line} I still can’t figure him out.”

Monologue.Current: “...Oh well.{Line} Can’t help it if we have{Line} different tastes in music.”
Monologue.Original: “...Oh well.{Line} Can’t help it if we have{Line} different tastes in music.”

Monologue.Current: “I wish he’d just let me in on it.{Line} I’d rock that Garden Festival stage,{Line} blow the roof off, y’know.”
Monologue.Original: “I wish he’d just let me in on it.{Line} I’d rock that Garden Festival stage,{Line} blow the roof off, y’know.”

Monologue.Current: “But that fool’s all about show.{Line} He thinks my looks just don’t cut it.”
Monologue.Original: “But that fool’s all about show.{Line} He thinks my looks just don’t cut it.”

Monologue.Current: “He doesn’t know{Line} what he’s missing.”
Monologue.Original: “He doesn’t know{Line} what he’s missing.”

Monologue.Current: “Tch...{Line} I don’t give anymore...”
Monologue.Original: “Tch...{Line} I don’t give anymore...”

Monologue.Current: “...Wait a minute.”
Monologue.Original: “...Wait a minute.”

Monologue.Current: “Does that fool know{Line} how to play{Line} anything?”
Monologue.Original: “Does that fool know{Line} how to play{Line} anything?”

Monologue.Current: “Don’t tell me{Line} he’s plannin’ on singing!?”
Monologue.Original: “Don’t tell me{Line} he’s plannin’ on singing!?”

Monologue.Current: “Это настоящий{Line} армейский пёс!”
Monologue.Original: “Our dog used to be{Line} with the army.”

Monologue.Current: “Они бросили его, потому что{Line} у него ужасное обоняние.”
Monologue.Original: “They released him because{Line} he has a terrible sense of smell.”

Monologue.Current: “Может, чутьё и неважное...{Pause 80}{Line} Но бегает он - будь здоров!{Line} После прогулки с ног валюсь!”
Monologue.Original: “He can’t smell, {Pause 80}but{Line} he sure can run. I’m always{Line} exhausted after I walk him.”

Monologue.Current: “Хороший мальчик!..”
Monologue.Original: “...There, there. Good boy.”

Monologue.Current: “Мы с сестрой гуляем{Line} с ним по очереди.”
Monologue.Original: “My sister and I take{Line} turns walking him.”

Monologue.Current: “Но в последнее время{Line} она свалила на меня всю работу.”
Monologue.Original: “But lately, she’s been{Line} really lazy and making{Line} me do all the work.”

Monologue.Current: “Сегодня опять сбежала{Line} из дома поиграть.”
Monologue.Original: “She snuck out of the house{Line} again today to go play.”

Monologue.Current: “Такими темпами, он её{Line} скоро узнавать перестанет.”
Monologue.Original: “If she keeps this up,{Line} he’s probably gonna forget{Line} who she is.”

Monologue.Current: “Прослежу, чтобы завтра{Line} она взяла его на прогулку!”
Monologue.Original: “I better make sure{Line} she takes him tomorrow.”

Monologue.Current: “Эх... Я устала.”
Monologue.Original: “Phew, I’m{Line} getting tired.”

Monologue.Current: “Ты слышала?”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, have you heard?”

Monologue.Current: “Сын миссис Динч сегодня{Line} сдаёт экзамен на звание сида!”
Monologue.Original: “Mrs. Dincht’s son is{Line} going to take the SeeD exam.”

Monologue.Current: “Серьёзно?!{Line} Не могу себе это представить!”
Monologue.Original: “Really...? I wonder if that{Line} rowdy boy can handle it?”

Monologue.Current: “А миссис Динч уже знает?”
Monologue.Original: “Does Mrs. Dincht{Line} know about this?”

Monologue.Current: “Мой сын сказал, что ему{Line} стоит упавать лишь на удачу.”
Monologue.Original: “The chances Zell will pass the exam{Line} is probably around 50%. At least{Line} that’s what my son said.”

Monologue.Current: “На экзамене ведь оценивают{Line} не только физические способности?”
Monologue.Original: “The exam doesn’t just test{Line} physical abilities, right?”

Monologue.Current: “Конечно нет! В основе лежит{Line} умение работать в команде....”
Monologue.Original: “Right. It also{Line} emphasizes teamwork.”

Monologue.Current: “Кроме того хладнокровие, {Line} умение принимать решения{Line} в сложной ситуации, и многое другое.”
Monologue.Original: “On top of that, composure,{Line} focus, proper decision making{Line} and much more.”

Monologue.Current: “Ох... сомневаюсь, что ему это по силам...”
Monologue.Original: “Oh my...{Line} I doubt he can handle it.”

Monologue.Current: “Не думаю, что миссис Динч{Line} стала бы его отговаривать...”
Monologue.Original: “I don’t think Mrs. Dincht will say{Line} anything to him, even if she knew.”

Monologue.Current: “Наверное, нам нужно{Line} просто пожелать ему удачи!”
Monologue.Original: “I guess all we can do is{Line} wish him luck.”

Monologue.Current: “Ты слышала?”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, have you heard?”

Monologue.Current: “Сын миссис Динч стал сидом!”
Monologue.Original: “Mrs. Dincht’s son passed{Line} the SeeD exam.”

Monologue.Current: “Невероятно! И как ему это удалось?!”
Monologue.Original: “Really? I wonder how in the world{Line} that rowdy boy passed.”

Monologue.Current: “А миссис Динч уже знает?”
Monologue.Original: “Does Mrs. Dincht know?”

Monologue.Current: “Ну, раз уж {Char Zell} справился,{Line} то шансы, что сдаст и мой оболтус,{Line} стремятся к бесконечности.”
Monologue.Original: “Since Zell passed, the chances{Line} my son will pass is probably{Line} near 100%.”

Monologue.Current: “На экзамене ведь оценивают{Line} не только физические способности?”
Monologue.Original: “The exam didn’t just test{Line} physical abilities, right?”

Monologue.Current: “Конечно нет! Мой сын сказал,{Line} что у {Char Zell}а подобралась{Line} отличная команда...”
Monologue.Original: “Right. My son told me{Line} Zell had good students on{Line} his team... Oh well...”

Monologue.Current: “Интересно, как долго он продержится.{Line} В конце концов, от сидов ожидают{Line} свойственного им хладнокровия,{Line} сосредоточенности, верных решений...”
Monologue.Original: “I wonder how long he’ll last.{Line} After all, SeeDs are expected to have{Line} composure and focus and make proper{Line} decisions.”

Monologue.Current: “Сомневаюсь, что ему это по силам...”
Monologue.Original: “Oh my...{Line} I doubt he can handle it.”

Monologue.Current: “I don’t think Mrs. Dincht will say{Line} anything to him, even if she knew.”
Monologue.Original: “I don’t think Mrs. Dincht will say{Line} anything to him, even if she knew.”

Monologue.Current: “I guess all we can do is{Line} wish him luck.”
Monologue.Original: “I guess all we can do is{Line} wish him luck.”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“No way!”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“No way!”

Monologue.Current: “I never get{Line} caught!”
Monologue.Original: “I never get{Line} caught!”

Monologue.Current: “I’m not givin’ up{Line} so easily...!”
Monologue.Original: “I’m not givin’ up{Line} so easily...!”

Monologue.Current: “...Yo!{Line} Zell!”
Monologue.Original: “...Yo!{Line} Zell!”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“Man, what did you do now?{Line} Who’s after you?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Man, what did you do now?{Line} Who’s after you?”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Hey, I gotta do what I gotta do{Line} or they’ll die.”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Hey, I gotta do what I gotta do{Line} or they’ll die.”

Monologue.Current: {Speaker}{Line}“...?”
Monologue.Original: {Speaker}{Line}“...?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“What are you talkin’ about...?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“What are you talkin’ about...?”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“I gotta save ’em and{Line} take ’em back to the sea.”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“I gotta save ’em and{Line} take ’em back to the sea.”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“...Hey!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“...Hey!”

Monologue.Current: “What the...?”
Monologue.Original: “What the...?”

Monologue.Current: “I got a bunch of{Line} kids waiting for{Line} me back home.”
Monologue.Original: “I got a bunch of{Line} kids waiting for{Line} me back home.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“...In the sea?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“...In the sea?”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Alright.”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Alright.”

Monologue.Current: “That’s all I{Line} gotta say.”
Monologue.Original: “That’s all I{Line} gotta say.”

Monologue.Current: “See ya.”
Monologue.Original: “See ya.”

Monologue.Current: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Not so fast!”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Not so fast!”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Crap!”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Crap!”

Monologue.Current: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Ok, come on, where{Line} did you hide them?”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Ok, come on, where{Line} did you hide them?”

Monologue.Current: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“...”
Monologue.Original: Big Bad Rascal{Line}“...”

Monologue.Current: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Hey!”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Hey!”

Monologue.Current: “Come back here!”
Monologue.Original: “Come back here!”

Monologue.Current: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“That’s it!{Line} No dinner for you!”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“That’s it!{Line} No dinner for you!”

Monologue.Current: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Ohhh, I can’t believe him. He took{Line} all the crabs I bought for dinner.”
Monologue.Original: Mother of Big Bad Rascal{Line}“Ohhh, I can’t believe him. He took{Line} all the crabs I bought for dinner.”

Monologue.Current: “It was for my husband, too.{Line} He’s coming home today.”
Monologue.Original: “It was for my husband, too.{Line} He’s coming home today.”

Monologue.Current: Garden Student{Line}“Hey, {Char Squall}.{Line} How’s it going?”
Monologue.Original: Garden Student{Line}“Hey, {Char Squall}.{Line} How’s it going?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“You’re here{Line} again?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“You’re here{Line} again?”

Monologue.Current: Garden Student{Line}“I got nowhere to go. I went back the{Line} other day and the Garden was gone.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Student{Line}“I got nowhere to go. I went back the{Line} other day and the Garden was gone.”

Monologue.Current: Garden Student{Line}“I guess that’s what I get for ditching{Line} too many times, eh...? Oh well...”
Monologue.Original: Garden Student{Line}“I guess that’s what I get for ditching{Line} too many times, eh...? Oh well...”

Monologue.Current: “Что? Хочешь поиграть?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет
Monologue.Original: “What? Oh, you wanna play cards?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: “Карты? Конечно, сыграем!”{Line}Хорошо{Line}Потом
Monologue.Original: “Sure, I’ll play. You ready?”{Line}Yes{Line}No
